li.label: Revenant Talons hard mode: Their raids will not flee and will attack immediately.
li.tooltip: They use to never auto-flee when you killed enough, due to their fanatical nature, and their raids were always immediate attacks. This option returns that zeal to see you dead no matter the cost.

li.label: Remove the fire panic debuff when Oni are struck by fire?
li.tooltip: Recently added at around start of RimWorld 1.4, to further emphasize their weakness to fire. This removes it if you don't want it.

li.text: Restarting game is required to apply any changes.
